en: Interview with Richard McHugh, resident of Gatlinburg. McHugh discusses the night of the fire and opening his home to his wife's family as well as two rescued cats. He also recounts the effects of the fire on the city afterwards in regards to the loss of local businesses. This is a representative quote from the interview: "I'm very proud of the way our people handled this at the community center, at Rocky Top, and everywhere else."
Individuals (tourists or locals) not directly affected by the fire
